original_title: Willaq Pirqa, el Cine de mi Pueblo
overview: Sistu and her small community in the Andes discover the magic of cinema. This meeting causes a stir but also confronts them with their culture and highlights the limitations of the community to understand and read Spanish. As a solution, they choose Sistu so that every week he goes to town to see a movie and tells it to everyone in the square.
title: Willaq Pirqa, the Cinema of My Village
